name: Anheuser-Busch InBev nv/sa
bossPosition: Vice President Legal & Corporate Affairs Europe
goal:
Anheuser-Busch InBev is the world's largest beer company motivated by its dream to be Bringing People Together for a Better World.

In essence, AB InBev wants to profitably sell top quality beers to build a strong, sustainable, global enterprise that builds connections with consumers and brings together stakeholders to make our world a better place.

A better place for the consumers who enjoy our products, the employees and partners who help us grow, the shareholders who have confidence in our prospects, and the stakeholders and the communities in which we live and operate.

Our Better World efforts are composed of two sets of goals by 2025:
1. Global smart drinking goals to contribute to WHO and UN SDG targets to reduce the harmful use of alcohol globally.
2. Sustainability goals focused on smart agriculture, water stewardship, circular packaging and climate action.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
1) Alcohol policy
2) Health policy
3) Environmental policy
4) Food policy
5) Audiovisual media & digital policy
6) Competition law & policy
7) Better Regulation
8) Tax policy
9) Trade policy
10) Internal market
11) Consumer policy
